title: Zoe, extremly toxic Champion
body:
How is it supposed to be fair, that a Champion can nuke more than 50% of your Health after hitting one simple Skillshot, on level 3 ?
Its simply because her Q is all she got, and therefor it deals way too much damage. At least in the early stages of the game.

Im fine getting nuked by a Burstmage, if he uses a Fullrotation of Spells including Ultimate, but doing it with just 2 Spells on level 3 seems not balanced at all.

Furthermore the randomness of her W ability seems well designed as well =)

What do you think of this "fun" champion ?

replies.body:
Fun champion? yes if u play zoe. if u play vs zoe no fun anymore? its same with Zed, Yasuo or something
its nothing some news
